text: Radamés Salazar Solorio (8 March 1974 – 21 February 2021) was a Mexican politician. He was a Senator from 2018 until his death. He was born in Jiutepec, Morelos. Salazar Solorio was a member of the National Regeneration Movement. Salazar Solorio died from COVID-19 in Mexico City during the COVID-19 pandemic in Mexico on 21 February 2021, fifteen days before his 47th birthday. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Mexican politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Mexico City Category:People from Morelos
title: Radamés Salazar Solorio
